name: dust attack
description:
play as the green cube and stay as long as possible!

movement

WASDleft click for shoot right click for bombs

enemies

dark: very speed - explodes after it touches the player (you don't earn score point if it touches you) - week health.light: slower than the dark - shoots dust - has more health.both explode after their health is 0.

whats new?!:

if dark enemies explode you don't earn score point.more sound effects!!bug fixes!

credits

sound from: https://freesound.org
